name: Finding Peace
description:
This is a minimalist game trying to represent what kind of things happen in mind when you go through  panic or panic attack at different levels  and are trying to find some inner peace.

Level name and hint to the level itself. 

This is an small game containing 5 levels. 

This was made in 48hrs during GTMK Gamejam 2020.

Background score credits: Sergey Cheremisinov - Northern Lullaby
